Decent place with plenty of parking. But avoid the showers. $8 got me 1 old, threadbare towel and a washcloth but I was given a second towel on request. The shower room itself looked clean enough, but the water smells like it's being …

… driver should be hassled after a long day on the road when we run all day we're looking for parking a meal to eat and a shower not to be robbed by these truck stops that are looking for a quick buck DONOT STOP AT THIS TRUCK STOP!!!!!!!!!
Nice place good truck parking very nice people and good shower's
Shower was dirty the night cashier isn't friendly at all

It’s Kwik Trip. Nice staff clean location friendly. Love the way they open extra lines when they start to get busy. You know like Wal-Mart use to do.
Showers are clean although towels are a bit old an can use some fabric softener …

working all over the state, I stop at multiple kwik trips a day. this one is one of the worst. parking area/gas pumps is always chaos. the 3 stars is for how clean they keep it inside with the amount of traffic. …
Absolutely wonderful experience, very clean, well stocked, and the team members were super super helpful when I had issues with my transaction. Highly recommend this stop.

There are no showers for 3 weeks!  Do not spend $$$$ on fuel for a shower they don't have any for 3weeks. A truck stop doing renovation, usually with common sense, would say close down half the showers while the half gets renovated, but …

showerReviews.reviewText: Shower: … More

Had a nice hot shower. Went for my salad, picked a good one. Went to the counter to auto pay and asked for salad dressing. Didn’t realize it was across from the salads. Nice to finally have a Pilot that lets you get your own salad dressing. …

… that the employees care. The fountain area was not so clean. When I got to my shower it wasn't all the way clean. The hand washing soap was empty, the toilet was loose on the floor and it has a hair line crack on it. You can actually see it …

I wanted to get a hot shower on a cold windy day and got very disappointed. The water was slightly warm and the flow was very weak. I got very cold. Also the trash bins were all full and people had to leave the trash outside the trash bins. …
Truck stop staff at night is terrible at night time u will always wait a 1hr to get a shower

There are just a couple of things we look for at the end of a drive day... clean hot shower (check), easy parking (check), and wifi.... nope... premium wifi here is horrible... .20 megs DL... almost as bad as dialup... my cell phones faster …

… have to give a star to leave a review!  This stop would be a NEG 5 star...was waiting over an hour for a shower, not one shower was being used, they were all empty since the time I walked in.  I always try to see if they are cleaning them …
Shower could use some TLC but the pressure and temperature were just right. I did not want to leave once the water hit my skin.

… While waiting on a shower,  I did meander about, looking at the coffee and fountain drink area, all appeared clean and stocked.  Subway was clean and friendly.  The folks running the registers were polite and greeted most customers. …

WIFI is horrible. Shower ap doesn't work. Best part.... Nasty lady working the counter told me no problems with our WiFi. I should have stayed at the Love's and paid to take a shower instead of using points of coming here. Here is a …

Feels dirty

am very disappointed with my recent experience at the Oak Creek Love’s. The shower facilities are outdated and not properly maintained, which makes them far below the standard that professional drivers expect. …

I am extremely disappointed with the service I received at this Love's location. For some reason, my account showed as "inactive" and I was unable to access a shower. I politely asked if my co-driver, with whom I run as a team, could redeem …

Very clean and friendly workers. Plenty of gas pumps for cars and trucks, spacious parking. I think a lot of truckers appreciate that they have showers here. They call your number when a shower stall is available.

Showers are dirty.  It's like they just do a garbage empty and a pathway sweep and it feels like you need floaties because they always flood the shower heads either one works or both at the same time never one or the other and some of the …

Pretty common truck stop. Great clean showers, hot towels and plenty of hot water but shower head was very low, like it was designed for somebody extremely short. I am 5,5 and had to get down to wash my hair

… place it's very clean they have and keep everything clean and all the staff are so very friendly and polite they have personal showers and TV area to watch the news they even have a dog park if your traveling with your pet I don't know if …

My husband and I came in to get a shower and he asked for extra towels and she responded that she couldn’t get us extra towels because she was the only one there and it’s two more love employees standing outside. We simply used another …

… unprofessional people. There were a lot of vacant showers available and I have been waiting for the last almost 50 minutes after reserving one but all the three ladies were busy talking and laughing in the counter desk. They were not …

Today, 9/30/23 . Stay away from this one. The employees here reject shower for my friend. They were hostile and tried to humiliate him. They were rude asking him where he parked his truck without them explaining why they were asking about …

locations.title: Petro Stopping Center
locations.content: Petro Stopping Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice clean store with a bunch of different stuff. Clean bathrooms. Good shower rooms with decent water pressure good hot water nice and clean and spacious. But the shower rooms have no ac so it gets very very hot in there. Almost feels like you need a shower again by the time you get done getting dressed.

People are nice, bathrooms are spotless and there is a lot to choose from food wise. The bar and grill has a nice outdoor area as well. Plenty of truck parking. It is only 2 hours free or 24 hours free with a truck fill up or 50 dollar purchase. Totally recommend the Danish Bakery inside!!

Awesome Showers and super clean. This place has a Blue Badger Bar and grill. Very good selection of goodies in the store as well and the staff is very friendly.  I wish all truck stops were like this one.
This place is the BEST truck stop I have been to. Clean, well stocked, lots of options for snacks/food and coffees. The showers are pristine and they give you plenty of towels. …

One of my favorite American owned truckstop along the way. Well stocked, very clean restrooms, friendly and professional staff, fresh variety of food and groceries to help restock my trucker fridge. …
Great selection of restaurants and grab-and-go food. Very clean location with friendly employees.
Been to many truck stops with clean restrooms but this was not one of them, and no toilet paper either, good think I carry my own, and the elder woman in the cashier has a bad attitude.

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I’ve ever been to. There’s soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago

showerReviews.reviewText: All I can say is the showers will steam clean an engine with the pressure and the heat!! Very clean operation
Very clean and nice gas station. Employees are friendly. Place is well stocked.

Better than the average truck stop. Much cleaner and more options than alternatives across the street. Has an Arby's attached along with cinnabon pizza and normal glass station selections. Many gas pumps and they are in a single row. Very well laid out.

… Shower ($11) very clean and roomy, at least #3 is. …
Where to start? The outside of the building was clean the store area was clean the shower was clean. The Cafe was clean and good food. Everyone I spoke with were friendly and helpful
Nice place.  Shower clean.   Good restaurant.
Excellent service. Clean shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice truck stop, too bad it's got so many empty trailers in it taking up spaces. I haven't tried the restaurant yet because it was closed by the time I got here. Sign says that's a temporary thing. The showers are not anything special and …
Stopped by to grab gas and use the bathroom . And this lady working on 8/24/25 at 10:30pm was an absolute peach. The whole time she was finding something to clean. She definitely needs a raise.
This place is my go to. Im the area often. Be It to fuel up, shower or just rest, it’s a breeze. They also fill my propane tank when I need it.  It’s safe here.
Clean rest rooms, stocked up convenience store, decent $5 showers, cheap laundry room. Big paved parking lot. Good little Cafe also.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad …
… Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. …

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would …

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this …

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn’t clean at all and from the looks of it hasn’t been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn’t cleaning them, …

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles …
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* …
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice ,clean little truck stop. They have 1 shower and they provide a towel and wash rag. All for the low price of $8. Cleaner than most TA's. They have a small truck parking area that has probably 15-20 spots. The prices are cheaper than …
… There is 1 shower here which is convenient and it was very clean. They do provide a fresh towel and wash cloth. …

Great crew and nice shower available for $8.00.
Parking $10.00 after 4 hours.
Excellent restaurant next door home cooking favorite Foods from 6am-3pm!
5 minutes away from Ameicold Appleton Wisconsin

Very friendly staff. The shower was well cleaned and not too small. The store is well kept and stocked. Limited hours but it gives the traditional values vibe. Diner Nextdoor is probably fantastic because it’s always full!
Only about 15 parking spots at $10 daily, shower price 8 or 10 dollars nice store, great dinner next door at good prices
This place is great. Really nice employees and shower is clean. They're pretty cheap on prices for sure
Nice and friendly staff $8 for shower. They only have one but it nice and clean with Hot water🤗. Truck parking for about 20 trucks behind the diner. It close at 11pm. …
They close at 8pm have only one shower, the owners work there and they are amazing that made the five star.
Not too bad. Small Place, have obe shower
Good price for a shower but there's only one and it has no toilet in it

What an absolutely disgusting gas station. The gas station was bad and bathrooms were even worse. Most of the people looked sketchy as heck. I wouldn't consider this a safe place to stop.
